strapiPost.title: Arkansas Joins The Big Dance With Illinois On Thursday
strapiPost.content:
After back-to-back NCAA Elite 8 appearances, Arkansas is headed back to the 2023 NCAA Championship for another March Madness run as the West Region's No. 8-seed.

  • The Muss Bus: This marks the third consecutive year Coach Musselman has led the Hogs to the tournament, following his fourth straight 20-win season.
  • Down the line: Arkansas will face No. 9-seed Illinois in the opening round on Thursday, Mar 16, at 3:30p, and a win would pit the Razorbacks against the winner of No. 1 seed Kansas and No. 16 seed Northern Kentucky on Saturday, Mar 18.

Find more information about the tournament HERE.
